meanings.definition: A person who is concerned with or engaged in public health.
meanings.sent1: The sanitarian helped improve the cleanliness of the community.
meanings.sent2: The sanitarian works to keep the public healthy and safe.
meanings.sent3: The sanitarian joked that germs were their arch-nemesis.
meanings.sent4: She was a sanitarian, fighting invisible enemies to protect the town.
meanings.sent5: The sanitarian's dedication to public health was truly admirable.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to public health or sanitation.
meanings.sent1: The sanitarian guidelines were followed to ensure a clean environment.
meanings.sent2: It is important to have sanitarian practices in food preparation.
meanings.sent3: The party decorations had a sanitarian touch to promote cleanliness.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as refreshing as a sanitarian breeze on a hot day.
meanings.sent5: The sanitarian measures taken prevented the spread of disease effectively.
